languages.text: "Ты все больше походишь на Теодору. Но даже она не переступала те грани, которые переступаешь ты. Еще пара шагов, и твоя душа безвозвратно погрязнет в ереси Архиврага. Я не могу взять на себя грех бездействия, {name}. Либо ты вернешься к свету Его, либо я рано или поздно покину этот нечестивый корабль".

"You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."
languages.original_text: "Ты все больше походишь на Теодору. Но даже она не переступала те грани, которые переступаешь ты. Еще пара шагов, и твоя душа безвозвратно погрязнет в ереси Архиврага. Я не могу взять на себя грех бездействия, {name}. Либо ты вернешься к свету Его, либо я рано или поздно покину этот нечестивый корабль".

traits.locale_text: "You are more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. You are mere steps away from your soul becoming irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot burden myself with the sin of inaction, {name}. Unless you come back to His light, sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

"You are more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. You are mere steps away from your soul becoming irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot burden myself with the sin of inaction, {name}. Unless you come back to His light, sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

"You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you've crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the sin of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

"You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you've crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the sin of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

"You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

"You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

languages.text: «Cada vez se parece más a Theodora. Pero incluso ella se detuvo a tiempo de no sobrepasar la línea que usted ha cruzado. Unos pasos más y su alma quedará irrevocablemente mancillada por la herejía del Archienemigo. No puedo cargar con la ofensa de la indolencia, {name}. Si no regresa usted a Su luz, tarde o temprano abandonaré esta nave impía».
languages.original_text: "You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez se parece más a Theodora. Pero incluso ella se detuvo a tiempo de no sobrepasar la línea que usted ha cruzado. Unos pasos más y su alma quedará irrevocablemente mancillada por la herejía del Archienemigo. No puedo cargar con el pecado de la indolencia, {name}. Si no regresa usted a Su luz, tarde o temprano abandonaré esta nave impía».

languages.text: “你已经变得越来越像西奥多拉了，但即便是她，也没像你这么肆无忌惮。如果你再这么走下去，你的灵魂便会不可挽回地落入混沌大敌的怀抱中。我无法容忍这种事情发生，{name}。如果你不愿回到祂的明光之中，那我迟早要离开这艘邪恶的船。”
languages.original_text: "You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

traits.locale_text: “你已经变得越来越像西奥多拉了，但即便是她，也没像你这么肆无忌惮。如果你再这么走下去，你的灵魂便会不可挽回地落入混沌大敌的怀抱中。我无法容忍这种事情发生，{name}。如果你不愿回到祂的明光之中，那我迟早要离开这艘邪恶的船。”

languages.text: « Vous ressemblez de plus en plus à Théodora, mais même elle s'est arrêtée avant de dépasser les limites que vous avez franchies. Continuez comme ça et bientôt, votre âme sera irrévocablement imprégnée de l'hérésie du Grand Ennemi. Je déteste l'inaction, {name}. Soit vous revenez dans Sa lumière, soit je quitterai tôt ou tard ce vaisseau impie. »
languages.original_text: "You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ressemblez de plus en plus à Théodora, mais même elle s'est arrêtée avant de dépasser les limites que vous avez franchies. Continuez comme ça et bientôt, votre âme sera irrévocablement imprégnée de l'hérésie du Grand Ennemi. Je déteste le péché d'inaction, {name}. Soit vous revenez dans Sa lumière, soit je quitterai tôt ou tard ce vaisseau impie. »

languages.text: 「あなたは、ますますシオドーラに似てきている。だが、彼女でさえ、あなたが越えた一線を越えるには至らなかった。あと数歩踏み出せば、あなたの魂は渾沌の宿敵の異端に、取り返しがつかないほど、どっぷりと浸かることになる。{name}、私は何もしないという罪に浴することはできない。あなたが主の光のもとに戻るか、いずれ私がこの不浄の船を離れるか、どちらかだ」
languages.original_text: "You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは、ますますシオドーラに似てきている。だが、彼女でさえ、あなたが越えた一線を越えるには至らなかった。あと数歩踏み出せば、あなたの魂は渾沌の宿敵の異端に、取り返しがつかないほど、どっぷりと浸かることになる。{name}、私は何もしないという罪に浴することはできない。あなたが主の光のもとに戻るか、いずれ私がこの不浄の船を離れるか、どちらかだ」

languages.text: "Ihr werdet mehr und mehr wie Theodora. Doch selbst sie hat Halt vor den Grenzen gemacht, die Ihr überquert habt. Noch einige wenige Schritte und Eure Seele steckt unwiderruflich in der Ketzerei des Erzfeinds fest. Ich kann den Fehler der Untätigkeit nicht ertragen, {name}. Entweder kommt Ihr wieder in sein Licht oder früher oder später werde ich dieses unheilige Schiff verlassen."
languages.original_text: "You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet mehr und mehr wie Theodora. Doch selbst sie hat Halt vor den Grenzen gemacht, die Ihr überquert habt. Noch einige wenige Schritte und Eure Seele steckt unwiderruflich in der Ketzerei des Erzfeinds fest. Ich kann die Sünde der Untätigkeit nicht ertragen, {name}. Entweder kommt Ihr wieder in sein Licht oder früher oder später werde ich dieses unheilige Schiff verlassen."

languages.text: "Gitgide Theodora'ya benziyorsun. O bile senin aştığın sınırları aşmadan kendini durdurabilmişti. Birkaç adım daha atarsan ruhun Şerbaşı'nın kâfirliğiyle geri alınamaz şekilde kaplanacak. Karar vermeme şansın yok {name}. Ya O'nun ışığına geri dönersin ya da ben bu gemiyi öyle veya böyle terk ederim."
languages.original_text: "You are becoming more and more like Theodora. But even she stopped short of crossing the lines you have crossed. A few more steps and your soul will be irrevocably mired in the Archenemy's heresy. I cannot bear the fault of inaction, {name}. Either you come back to His light, or sooner or later I will leave this unholy ship."

traits.locale_text: "Gitgide Theodora'ya benziyorsun. O bile senin aştığın sınırları aşmadan kendini durdurabilmişti. Birkaç adım daha atarsan ruhun Şerbaşı'nın kâfirliğiyle geri alınamaz şekilde kaplanacak. Karar vermeme şansın yok {name}. Ya O'nun ışığına geri dönersin ya da ben bu gemiyi öyle veya böyle terk ederim."
